review:
This rubix cube is so smooth to operate & the plastic is good. Best one for a
beginner.

Very smooth. Use it a lot, as does my son. I am able to clock better speeds in
solving the cube. And the absence of the traditional stickers, that peel off,
make it look aesthetically great. However, the "Negi" logo on the middle
yellow square got wiped out after about 15 minutes of usage. The absence of
the logo doesn't bother me too much, just love this cube!

I've ordered 3 of these cubes, arrived as perfect. It is so smooth to handle
and light weight. It is a good toy for adults and kids.

At this price, it is one of best rubic's cube I came across. Very smooth
movements and even after few months of extensive usage, it has its smoothness
the same when I bought. Highly recommended for any new buyer to practice with
this cube. Value for money.

It is durable and difficult to break, I have dropped it many times. It had
lubrication fluid applied to it, but it will wear off eventually. Very
satisfied with the cube.

I've been using this Cube for past 10 months and is perfect for a beginner to
learn Rubik's cube.  
1\. Smooth movement. doesn't get stuck when solving.  
2\. The colour of the cube hasn't faded a little bit yet even after using it
so much.  
3\. No crack or sign of damage even after it fell many times so a rigid
product.  
Good to go to buy.

I've been using it for a week, seems like a robust cube. Being a decent
product, any beginner can buy it.  
However, If anyone's looking for speed cubing, you may wanna consider another
product. Doing finger tricks becomes hard on this. Not so smooth.

Cube is of good quality but may not be suitable for speed cubing. Plastic
material, color is bit bright than usual cubes.  
  
Pros:  
1\. Flexible Smooth movement.  
2\. Permanent Coloring.  
3\. Delivery was as expected.  
  
Cons:  
1\. Spring sound could be heard.  
2\. Poor packing  
  
Over all: Satisfactory product. Worth the Money :)

I would totally recommend it for the beginners like me. The quality of the
plastic is superb and it works fabulously. It just doesn't cut corners like a
speed cube, it does cut corners really good, but not as good as a speed cube.
Overall it is a very nice product.

I've had a few cubes but in this price range, this one is pretty good. I had
my doubts about this but it turned out to be a pleasant deal. Quite smooth,
doesn't have a total plastic box feel, and is quite quick. Spending 150 on a
Rubix cube doesn't get better than this.

title: Good place to start for beginners or mid-pros
Smooth and Amazing ! A bit small though...

Go for it

i am satisfied with this.

review:
An excellent cube for a beginner to mid-level pro solver. Has excellent turn
speed and smoothness. I have tried many speed cubes and stickerless cubes
before, however, they did seem a bit too large for my taste. This cube is, in
my opinion, is at a perfect size to performance ratio. I have fairly large
size hands (I'm 6ft high). Although it did take a bit of time to get used to
the small cube, coming from years of using large cubes, was fairly easy.  
  
Pros :  
Smooth turning  
Perfect size for any size hands  
Very little to No maintainance  
  
Cons :  
The logo of the manufacturer is a bit distracting (It's on the centerpiece of
the white face)  
  
Verdict : Although there is only one major con that I can point out with the
cube, it is fairly easy to remove the logo with a razor blade and 5 minutes of
work. If you are looking to getting into speed solving, or just solving in
general, this is a very good place to start off.

It's very smooth and perfect. The colors are pleasing. The size however is a
bit small than I thought it would be. But then again, size is always a
personal preference. It's stickerless and feels very durable.

Excellent cubes..but quality issues. I ordered three. Two were fine and one
had two chips missing. So Amazon sent me a replacement which is fully
scratched which I am guessing was a previous return from some other customer.
Since it works i am not returning it again. However a bit disappointed by the
QC checks. But for the price cant compain much. Definitely buy it without
thinking much. Same cubes under other brand names are being sold at higher
prices

Very smooth. Feels good. Stickerless. The best you can get at this price.
Bought at ₹164

Starting from packaging, Amazon page in awesome way. a small box with plastic
packing. But this cube, at any cost please don't buy this cube. A mere waste
of money and it is very very loose. Just turn it a bit and lo, it breaks...  
Can't play Even for 15 minutes. From image it may look awesome, but when you
experience after opening, sure to get angry.

Poor quality. I bought this after seeing the tag of 'Amazon's Choice', however
the cube delivered isn't the same as the picture given. The cube has flashy
colors, loosely bound and makes spring sound. The movement is not at all
smooth and i really wonder why so many people have given good ratings. The
logo got wiped out in a day. I don't suggest anyone to buy this.

i loved this cube, speed is very good and finally i am satisfied with this.  
  
if you are cube lover so i want to tell you try this out you will get
fantastic experience.

The cube is fast enough and unlike other cubes the color does not fade. The
Cube I recieved did not have the RS Negi text/logo.

turns. But the colors that i got in this cube was some what of matt finish
..rather than the glossy one which the product image is ...Dont know how i got
the one with dull matt finish colour ..And finally performance is very good at
this price.

Magnificent piece of art.I have an old original rubik's cube(basic version)
which comes nowhere near to this product..the rubik's cube broke on a single

Original Review: Five stars. Excellent quality!  
  
Updated: 1st April, 2017.  
The quality has deteriorated since my original purchase an year back. The new
ones I ordered had all sort of scratches and was of poor build quality, felt
like used.

Cube quality good but bit cheap plastic. If you are beginner go for it but if
you know how to solve and already you can solve less than 90 secs then don't
even think of it.  
Pros:  
1)Smooth  
2)Bright colors  
3) feels good to rotate because of it's spring quality  
4)Easy to carry in pocket  
  
CONS:  
1)Pops 1 out of 5 times  
2)Middle piece is quite loose  
  
Overall quite good. Obviously don't expect too much in this low price.

Sturdy, smooth movement. Just that the colors are not very distinct. They blur
into each other in low light.. Otherwise a good product

Very nice product, steady. It's not a speed cube so motion is not fast as
compared to a speed cube but cube motion is quite smooth as compared to others
at this price range

Quality is best. Very very smooth and very attractive. I can solve it within 3
min (according to my practice). However, it is a very smooth and cost
effective speed cube. I suggest to buy, because it really have quality. Yes,
it performs all moves possible that you see in youtube.

Feels smooth and comfortable while turning the cubes. And is well finished.
Hope it stays that way over time and doesn't become too loose and wobbly over
time.

Good product for quick break and leisure. Using it for some months now, I
think after 4 - 5 I started to hear the springs crank inside, so put some
machine oil in between the cube lines and now it moved more efficiently than
ever before

Good job, RS Negi!! And yes, Awesome Price, until I can afford to spend 1000
Rs for the imported speed cubes!

One of the better speed cubes I've owned. It does gets loosened up with time.
However, considering the price, I'd definitely give it a huge thumbs up if
you're looking for a speed cube to buy.

I had bought this cube last year but I gave it to my elder brother. I've again
bought this since it is a good cube.The colours are bright and vivid. The size

from funskool and other such brands but it is the best in its price range. The
colors of both the cubes have not faded since their first usage in last year's
August. All and all, I love this cube.
